Dreamer of the Legend Tittle:
Complete certain clan missions or collect Prophecy Fragment in some hunting zones.
Bring them to me, and I will be able to tell who is mentioned there.
If you get Legend's Marks while deciphering the Prophecy Fragments, you can add them to a collection.
After completing the collection, you will get a buff: P.Atk./M.Atk./P.Def./M.Def. +5%
The effect will be Active till the end of the event.
So, hurry and join in!
[1. Hunting zones where Prophecy Fragments can be acquired]
- If you are of Lv. 99 and higher, you can acquire up to 3 Prophecy Fragments a day in the following hunting zones.
(The count is reset daily at 6:30 a.m. (server time).)
Hunting Zones
Recommended level and conditions

[2. Clan missions where Prophecy Fragments can be acquired]
- You can acquire up to 20 pcs. for the following missions
(The count is reset after weekly maintenance)

Additional event reward
